I have been downloading this for the past few weeks, sigh. It is usually always around 5kb/s, compared to my usual dl speed of 600 kb/s on all other torrents. Look, I do not mean to sound like I'm complaining, because on every lucky occasion the speed goes up to about 100kb/s, but could someone PLEASE seed this, be it the actual uploader, or just some random who happens to have the files, because I have been stuck on 70% for almost a month now tbh.

Thanks for the actual upload @rtallman, however the lack of seeders is very frustrating, and I have come to the conclusion that you are not seeding it either anymore, which increases my frustration. I never usually comment on torrents btw, as there are soi many trolls/spammers etc, the only reason I am writing this, is because it is a general plea to anyone who might have this! PLEASE!
Ditto here. Much appreciated folks. Thanks.
Thanks for uploading :) Speed isn't to bad expecially if you put the first five seasons on. Download those then while watching you can download the next five and so on and so fourth.

we had  baltic edition of the survivor for 3 seasons, in each season there were three tribes, all with members from different countries, one Estonian tribe, one Lithuanian tribe and one Estonian tribe. The show ran 2000-2002, good times, good times:)
we don't get this show in the UK so thanks for the upload i have a LOT of watching to do!!!
